name: Big Money Machine
description:
You've been told that there's no way to win that money... But you're stubborn. You try everyday, at all costs. Prove them they are lying! 

There are two ways to make the money back can you find them?

Last screenshots show prototype vs concept art c:

Made for #communitygamejam, in hours after work.

mouse controls and esc for menu.
Pc version only for OSX go here https://drive.google.com/file/,
